strapiPost.title: It's Pickin' Time On 59 This Weekend
strapiPost.content:
Hey, all you yard-sale-hunters and flea-market-fanatics, it’s Pickin’ Time on 59 this weekend, Sept 22-24.  

  • Yard sales for miles: This annual event features 26 miles of yard sales along Highway 59 in Siloam Springs, Gentry, Decatur, Gravette, and Sulphur Springs. Many flea markets along the route are also offering big sales this weekend.
  • Get in on the action: Some towns along Highway 59, like Gravette, won’t be requiring yard sale permits for residents on these days, even if your yard sale is not located along Highway 59. Check with your city, it might not be too late to set up your own yard sale!

Check out a map of sellers HERE.
